snippet: By potentially spinning off its Nook unit, Barnes & Noble is once again setting the stage for a major effort to rejigger its operations, amid a history replete with spinoffs and attempted deals.
abstract: By potentially spinning off its Nook unit, Barnes & Noble is once again setting the stage for a major effort to rejigger its operations, amid a history replete with spinoffs and attempted deals.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: With Nook Plan, Barnes & Noble Readies Another Shake-Up
